title: Find The Missing Boots
content:
Find The Missing Boots Type Quest Chapter 1 Location Underdark - Beach Reward Bracing Band or Robust Chain Shirt

Find The Missing Boots

Find The Missing Boots is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Find The Missing Boots can be acquired during Chapter 1.

Find The Missing Boots Objectives

Find the deep gnome runaway. Get the boots.

Find The Missing Boots Walkthrough

If you are not hostile with the duergars, you will meet one at the Underdark - beach. Who ask you to track down a runaway slave with a
